tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor really took his time to patiently listen and give advice . Would highly recommend it. Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The staff was exceptionally courteous and professional, particularly the nursing team. The hospital environment was clean and well-maintained, and the service was efficient. My overall experience was positive, and I appreciate the care I received at your hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Aamir was patient while listening to the issues I had. The blood report too he explained properly and suggested the areas where I need to work and improve on my health. The receptionist Pranavi was very polite and communicated properly. The nurse was quick and good with pre check. I recommend visiting this clinic for general health checkup

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: None
review:
Doctor Consultation in Clinikk last week,  where I have unbearable pain.
They treated with care and patience , and provided tablets and injection.

They are followed up with after a day, 2, 3 and asked the health conditions.

Really appreciate this.

Price is also very considerably.

tags: None
review: ****** ** ************* *** Clinic is very well maintained. Utmost care is taken to maintain hygiene. You don't need to wait much if you have a prior appointment. Fees is very reasonable. No extra tests, only required medication to treat the problem. I recommend the doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: i had a severe fever of 105 , i met the doctor at Clinikk for a consultation. he asked me to take a few blood tests. what I like about clinikk was i didn't have to go some other centre for a blood test. it was available in clinikk itself.  not only I get medicines as well immediately. this made my illness journey smooth. after a week I received a follow-up call from clinikk to check on my health status. i was really impressed and convinced with services available at Clinikk. If you are looking for a General physician who can be like family doctor then Clinikk is the best healthcare centre in adugodi.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: It was a really nice experience. I will recommend to everyone . Doctor explained everything and he was so polite and knowledgeable

tags: None
review: doctor is so friendly and he explained what actual problem is and also very friendly and helpful staff

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: -Had a very good experience at the clinic. Doctor as well as the staff was very helpful and supportive. Doctor listened the issue very carefully and addressed each of the problem. Explained all the medications properly and its usage.
